mapper.insert: INSERT INTO department_survey (department_id, department_name, survey_id, assign_at) SELECT #{departmentId} as department_id, d.name as department_name, #{surveyId} as survey_id, NOW() as assign_at FROM departments d WHERE d.id = #{departmentId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) > 0 FROM department_survey WHERE survey_id = #{surveyId} AND department_id = #{departmentId}
